attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The decision to make company vehicles NO smoking DOMAINS when the anti-smoking law becomes active is quite frankly.... ludicrous. I feel it is a breach of my human rights, and most of all quite clearly dangerous, and has not been given thought to the fact, that when drivers/people smoke in cars, it is both relaxing and calming. Will the ban not create more road rage, as people become needy for there cigarettes. Will it not create drivers/people falling asleep at the wheel, where normally they would smoke and stay alert in there driving.
When the money being spent totalling over £26million on inforcement officers for local councils could be spent on MORE POLICE.., SCHOOLS.., TACKLING CRIME.., HOSPITALS.., RE-OPENING THE HUNDREDS OF SHUT POLICE STATIONS.. THE LIST GOES ON....

rejection.details: The title of your petition must be a request for an action, not simply your name.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
